channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WebP & SVG Support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WebP & SVG Support

item.title: CVE-2024-3633|2024-08-01T20:19:59.847Z -- unknown -- webp%20%26%20svg%20support
item.description: The WebP & SVG Support WordPress plugin through 1.4.0 does not sanitise uploaded SVG files, which could allow users with a role as low as Author to upload a malicious SVG containing XSS payloads.
